root.name: You're In the Movies
root.description: OverviewYou're in the Movies was announced at the Microsoft Press Conference during the E3 2008 Media and Business Summit by Shane Kim. The game requires use of the Xbox Live Vision Cam. To play, you are filmed doing a variety of actions. Once these actions are all complete, the game puts them together and makes a movie out of them. Every movie has four different characters so you can play with up to 3 friends. During E3, it was also announced that the game would come bundled with the Xbox Live Vision Cam.Xbox 360 Installation The amount of memory it takes to install this game is 4.7 GB.
